name: HerMail
short_description:
This self-contained cross-platform email-client is in BETA phase, currently for testing/studying purposes, not for everyday use in the 1st place. It still has some issues, however almost fully functional. Contains calendar and address book, supports POP and SMTP, SSL is included but uncertain if working or not. FLTK and all libraries, hand-coded MIME-support are contained in the executables, all under/around 1Mbyte.
You can maybe take ideas/parts from the source-code...or use only the Calendar which is a stable part of HerMail...whatever... I shared it, maybe some people will benefit a little from the source-code a in some way...
